entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of light snow this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Thursday 30 March 2023
